name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-nested-auth-csharp
title: This sample shows nested app authentication.
shortDescription: This sample showcases Azure AD single sign-on (SSO) within a Microsoft Teams tab, utilizing the On-Behalf-Of (OBO) flow to call Microsoft Graph APIs in C#.
longDescription: This Microsoft Teams sample app demonstrates the implementation of Azure AD single sign-on (SSO) using the On-Behalf-Of (OBO) flow to access Graph APIs in a Teams tab. It features nested app authentication, streamlining user authentication across Microsoft 365 applications for a seamless experience.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing gif nested app authentication

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
